des: "This fun, refreshing cocktail puts a fresh berry twist on the classic mojito. It combines silver rum and raspberry vodka with fresh berries, lime juice, and mint leaves. Top it off with a splash of club soda. A house specialty at 230 Fifth in New York City, it's the perfect summer refresher."
ins: Muddle mint leaves, raspberries, simple syrup, and lime juice together in a shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add vodka and rum; cover and shake until chilled. Pour entire contents of shaker into a Collins glass and top with club soda.
